","usphone":"kru'sed","remMethod":"crus(十字) + ade → 原指十字军东征 → 宗教战争","phrases":"crusade against: 讨伐
","sentences":"Dante: I took up the crusade. The bishop assured us that our sins would be absolved.
^^但丁： 我参与了十字军东征。主教向我们保证我们的罪会被赦免。^^
Hard to believe that a life of glamour and wealth would be able to rob Xuande of his noble ambitions and crusade to give peace and prosperity to the common people.
^^很难相信一个生命充满魅力和财富的玄德会用抢和类似十字军东征的方式实现他高尚的抱负并给普通百姓带来安定与和平。^^
","relWords":"n.
crusader: 改革者；十字军战士

"},"$:/GMAT_3/convection_10":{"title":"$:/GMAT_3/convection_10","word":"convection","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-GMAT_3/Word}}","created":"20220419132432845","transCn":"n. 对流
","usphone":"kən'vɛkʃən","phrases":"natural convection: 自然对流
convection heat transfer: 对流传热
forced convection: 强制对流；人工对流
heat convection: 热对流
convection section: [工]对流部分
mantle convection: 地函对流，地幔对流；地幔对流
convection diffusion: 对俩散
convection coefficient: 对流系数，膜层散热系数
convection zone: 对流区（等于convective zone）
","sentences":"...clouds which lift warm, moist air by convection high into the atmosphere.
^^...云层通过对流把温暖湿润的空气送到高的大气层中。^^
","relWords":"n.
convector: 对流式暖房器；对流散热器；[建] 换流器

vi.
convect: 对流传热

vt.
convect: 使热空气对流

","synos":"n.
[流][气象]对流；传送：transmission, convective flow
"},"$:/GMAT_3/skeleton_100":{"title":"$:/GMAT_3/skeleton_100","word":"skeleton","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-GMAT_3/Word}}","created":"20220419132432857","transCn":"n. 骨架， 骨骼
","usphone":"'skɛlɪtn","remMethod":"“skin里头” → 皮肤里头是骨骼","phrases":"steel skeleton: 钢骨架
skeleton structure: 骨架构造
skeleton staff: 基干人员
","sentences":"We agreed on a skeleton outline of the proposal.
^^我们给提案商定了一个基本框架。^^
","relWords":"adj.
skeletal: 骨骼的，像骨骼的；骸骨的；骨瘦如柴的

","synos":"n.

adj.

"},"$:/GMAT_3/superficial_1000":{"title":"$:/GMAT_3/superficial_1000","word":"superficial","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-GMAT_3/Word}}","created":"20220419132432952","transCn":"adj. 肤浅的； 粗略的

","usphone":"'kæʒuəlti","remMethod":"casual(随便的) + ty → 因为随随便便造成的 → 伤亡","phrases":"casualty insurance: 灾害保险；不幸事故保险
